instructions: Back up data on the internal memory. From the Home screen, swipe and tap Settings . Tap System > Reset options > Erase all data . Tap RESET PHONE . Enter your PIN or Password, then tap Next . Tap ERASE EVERYTHING . The device will reboot and begin resetting to factory settings.

Press and hold the Volume down and Power button at the same time. When the OnePlus logo appears, release the Power button, but continue holding the Volume down button. At the Password screen, enter the Password or PIN number that you use to unlock your device. When done, tap Ok. Tap English. Tap Wipe data and cache. Tap Reset everything (Music, pics, etc) . Tap This can not be undone, continue? Tap Reboot to restart your phone.

From the Home screen, swipe up, then tap Settings . Tap System > Reset Options > Reset Wi-Fi, mobile & Bluetooth . Tap RESET SETTINGS . Enter your PIN or Password, then tap Next . Tap RESET SETTINGS again to confirm.
